Comments_List: I have learnt what is cultural history, how to conduct cultural history research, and how to find interesting research questions.

The course is perfectly organized. The readings are interesting and Prof Dean's interpretation of the readings are quite helpful, profound and interesting. She listed several points that we need to pay attention to every week before so that we can have a better focus when reading.

Sure, it is quite interesting. I find it a necessity to take this course for students in culture history. It offers various interesting cultural history work and Prof Dean will guide us perfectly to know how to conduct a cultural history research and how to think like a cultural historian.
